title: Retirement Health Savings Act of 2015
content: Retirement Health Savings Act of 2015 This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income, for income tax purposes, distributions from certain tax-exempt retirement plans to a heath savings account in which an individual who is covered by a high deductible health care plan is participating . The bill also exempts suchnbsp, distributions from the 10 penalty fornbsp, premature retirement plan distributions.
